description: Experience NYC the right way in this modern and comfortable 2 bedroom/ 2 full bath open layout. This location has a private entrance and a backyard. It is also minutes from the subway(2,5) making it easy to explore all NYC has to offer. This space is great  for couples, adventurers, travelers, families (with children) and groups. We speak english and spanish but everyone is welcome.
name: Modern Brooklyn Residence
review: Magyarok, ajánlom a lakást mindenkinek. Ár / Èrték arány kiváló.
